parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Zero-based index of the desired triangle

title: IDisplayData.GetTriangleAtIndex
description: Gets the triangle at the specified index.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Zero-based index of the desired triangle

remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles:
[
vertexPt1
[3],
vertexPt2
[3],
vertexPt3
[3],
isFilled
,
lineType
]
where:
vertexPt1
[3]
First XYZ vertex point
vertexPt2
[3]
Second XYZ vertex point
vertexPt3
[3]
Third XYZ vertex point
isFilled
Boolean returned as a double that is True if the triangle is filled, false otherwise
lineType
Line type as defined in
swLineTypes_e
